price: Mélòó mélòó nínú àwọn ìlú tí A ti parẹ́! Ìyà Wa dé bá wọn ní òru tàbí nígbà tí wọ́n ń sun oorun ọ̀sán lọ́wọ́.
arabic: وَكَم مِّن قَرۡيَةٍ أَهۡلَكۡنَٰهَا فَجَآءَهَا بَأۡسُنَا بَيَٰتًا أَوۡ هُمۡ قَآئِلُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wakam min qaryatin ahlaknāhā fajāahā basunā bayātan aw hum qāilūna
